short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build Salesforce LWC development easy and fastest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💻 𝑯𝒐𝒘 𝒕𝒐 𝑼𝒔𝒆 𝑳𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒏𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑺𝒕𝒖𝒅𝒊𝒐:
  ●  Log in to Salesforce and click the Lightning Studio icon located in the browser’s top-right corner (Standard Chrome extension toolbar).
  ●  Wait for the icon to turn blue, indicating it’s ready to use.
  ●  For first-time installations, refresh the page before accessing the extension.

🔎𝑭𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔:───────────────────────────────────────────
 ✔ 𝐐𝐮𝐢𝐜𝐤 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Create or update LWC, LMS, and Apex classes.
 ✔ 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐅𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Add files for specific LWC components.
 ✔ 𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡: Find code in LWC files and Apex classes.
 ✔ 𝐃𝐢𝐟𝐟 𝐂𝐡𝐞𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐫: Compare code changes easily.
 ✔ 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐐𝐋 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐞𝐫: Test and run GraphQL queries.
 ✔ 𝐒𝐎𝐐𝐋 𝐭𝐨 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐐𝐋: Convert SOQL queries into GraphQL format.
 ✔ 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐮𝐩 & 𝐃𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐥𝐨𝐚𝐝: Download specific components, files, folders, or full ZIP backups.
 ✔ 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐮𝐩 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬: Delete components or individual files.

📝 𝑬𝒅𝒊𝒕𝒐𝒓 𝑬𝒙𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒊𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆: ─────────────────────────────────────
  ●  𝐐𝐮𝐢𝐜𝐤 𝐃𝐞𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Save and deploy changes instantly with  𝗖𝗧𝗥𝗟+𝗦 (Window) or ⌘+𝗦 (Mac).
  ●  𝐋𝐖𝐂 𝐒𝐧𝐢𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐭𝐬: Access a full library of 𝘀𝗵𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗰𝘂𝘁 𝗸𝗲𝘆𝘀 for faster LWC development.
  ●  𝐓𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐞 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬: Switch between 𝗗𝗮𝗿𝗸 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 and 𝗟𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 for a personalized coding experience.
  ●  𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐓𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐬: Choose from a variety of editor color themes to suit your style.
────────────────────────────────────────────────────
🌐𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: https://nisar-99.github.io/Lightning-Studio
────────────────────────────────────────────────────
